hero.title: Reasons to Believe!
hero.description: Islam invites you to explore the magnificent creation, where every discovery reveals another chapter in the unfolding story of God's boundless wisdom. Far from standing in opposition to faith, science becomes a trusted companion in this awe-inspiring journey of understanding.

suffering.title: Why is there suffering in the world?
paragraphs: Each of us faces unique trials, a personalized test of faith. These challenges, whether great or small, are not just a reflection of God's love but even opportunities for growth. While we cannot control the storms that rage around us, we choose how we weather them. Our response, not our circumstance, is what truly matters.

This world is but a fleeting moment, a prelude to eternity. The injustices we endure here will be rectified in a realm of perfect justice. If you think this life is all there is, you've missed the grandest picture. We are destined for something infinitely greater, an eternal paradise called Jannah. Our trials here are stepping stones to that ultimate reward.

tools.title: NASA's Eyes
tools.subtitle: Interactive 3D
tools.description: Explore the solar system, the universe, and the spacecraft exploring them with this 3D visualization tool from NASA. Witness the majesty of Allah's creation on a cosmic scale.

tools.title: Scale of the Universe
tools.subtitle: Interactive Scale
tools.description: An interactive experience that shows the relative scale of objects in the universe, from quantum foam to the observable universe. A humbling perspective on creation.

tools.title: Cell Size and Scale
tools.subtitle: Microscopic World
tools.description: Discover the microscopic world of cells and molecules that make up all living things. Each cell is a universe of complexity, testifying to Allah's perfect design.

tools.title: Earth Wind Map
tools.subtitle: Real-time Data
tools.description: A visualization of global weather conditions, showing the complex and beautiful patterns of wind, weather, and ocean currents - all moving by Allah's command.
